MS MCQs

    Ship and invoice items in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. Which of the following is not an option when you post a Sales Order?

      Invoice

      Ship

      Partial Ship

      Ship and Invoice


    2. If you need to process a sales invoice of multiple sales shipments from different orders, what function should you use?

      Get Shipment Lines function in a sales invoice.

      Combine Shipments function in a sales order.

      Get Recurring Sales Lines function in a sales invoice.

      Get Recurring Sales Lines in a sales order.


    3. When you post an invoice with completely ordered quantity, what will happen to your sales order?

      The Sales Order will be deleted automatically.

      The Sales Order will be deleted automatically if you mark the Delete Order option.

      When you are invoicing through a combine shipment, you can’t completely invoice the ordered quantity.

      The Sales Order won’t be deleted automatically, but the posted sales lines are removed from the order, unless if it’s invoiced through a combined shipment.


    4. Which of the following statements on sales processes in Business Central are true?

      Posting an item shipment from a sales order will create a posted sales shipment and will update inventory.

      Entering a sales invoice will update the customer card.

      You can start the sales process with a sales offer document.

      Invoicing a sales order will not update the chart of accounts.
